elements.name: Text
elements.description: Displays one or more lines of read-only text with formatting support.

elements.name: Image
elements.description: Displays an image from various data sources, with support for resizing and rendering modes.

elements.name: Button
elements.description: A control that triggers an action when interacted with, customizable with labels and styles.

elements.name: Picker
elements.description: Presents a list of mutually exclusive options for the user to choose from.

elements.name: ProgressView
elements.description: Displays the progress of a task or process, with customizable styles and animations.

elements.name: TextField
elements.description: A control that displays an editable text interface, with support for various keyboard types and input formatting.

elements.name: Slider
elements.description: A control that displays a slider to select a value from a range, with customizable appearance and behavior.

elements.name: Toggle
elements.description: A control that displays a switch to toggle between two states, with customizable labels and styles.

elements.name: Stepper
elements.description: A control that increments or decrements a value with customizable step sizes and styles.

elements.name: DatePicker
elements.description: A control that allows the user to select a date or date range, with various display modes and styles.

elements.name: Tap Gesture
elements.description: Recognizes tapping gestures on a view, with customizable actions and modifiers.

elements.name: Long Press Gesture
elements.description: Recognizes long press gestures on a view, with customizable actions and modifiers.

elements.name: Drag Gesture
elements.description: Recognizes dragging gestures on a view, with customizable actions and modifiers.

elements.name: Rotation Gesture
elements.description: Recognizes rotation gestures on a view, with customizable actions and modifiers.

elements.name: Magnification Gesture
elements.description: Recognizes pinch-to-zoom gestures on a view, with customizable actions and modifiers.

elements.name: VStack
elements.description: A vertical stack that arranges its child views in a vertical line, with customizable spacing and alignment.

elements.name: HStack
elements.description: A horizontal stack that arranges its child views in a horizontal line, with customizable spacing and alignment.

elements.name: ZStack
elements.description: A view that overlays its child views on top of each other, with control over their positioning and layering.

elements.name: ScrollView
elements.description: A scrollable view that displays its content within a bounded frame, with various scroll behavior options.

elements.name: NavigationView
elements.description: Provides a hierarchical navigation structure for presenting different views, with customizable navigation bars and transitions.

elements.name: Implicit Animation
elements.description: Automatically applies smooth animations to view changes, with customizable timing and behavior.

elements.name: Explicit Animation
elements.description: Allows you to control and customize animations for specific view changes, with various timing curves and options.

elements.name: Spacer
elements.description: A flexible space that expands to fill the remaining space in a layout.

elements.name: Divider
elements.description: A visual separator that can be used to divide sections or views.

elements.name: Padding
elements.description: Adds padding (spacing) around a view or group of views.

elements.name: Alignment Guides
elements.description: Guides that help align views within their parent container, such as leading, trailing, center, etc.

elements.name: Frame
elements.description: Allows you to set the size and positioning of a view relative to its parent.
